trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Belleville
There were no other sightings in Belleville on or around September 12th 2010
Summary: Static orbs in sky as Golden Knights were about to perform.
divs: sighting detailsair show at scott airforce base 9\12\10. golden knights about to exit plane when i noticed two bright white objects in the nw sky. both static in movement at the time and in same general area with some seperation between the two. tried to show them to my father but he did not see, my mother however did see the second orb. first orb headed off to nw at very high speed. second orb was static for 10 to 15 seconds after the first left the area, then followed the first orb, same heading, very high rate of speed, straight flight path. i have sent a inquery to public affairs at scott airforce base, not that i expect much of a reply.
